Example using Markdown as canonical format to test alternative ways to write instruction blocks (commands)

# Self closing shorthand

::: create message :::

::: create message :::

Another paragraph with no empty line between

# Next block only shorthand

::: edit message >>>

Paragraph to edit

::: edit message >>>

Paragraph to edit with no empty line between

Other types of content,

::: edit improve this >>>

```{python}

```


::: create admonition >>>

:::{.callout-warning}
This is a warning
:::

Following para outside of instruction content.

# Multiple blocks

::: edit

Paragraph to edit #4

Paragraph to edit #5

:::
